content: Standard-class abrasive disc for cutting drywall stud using chop saws AC-D DS Drywall stud cutting disc ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Designed for everyday use - abrasive cutting disc pairs with chop saws to quickly and easily cut through drywall studs Helps your budget go further - more economical price point helps free up budget for other construction site costs Less time spent reworking - make smoother cuts with greater speed, strength and flexibility the first time Work more safely and comfortably - compliant with the highest safety standards, and ANSI B7.1 and OSA certified Precisely matched to Hilti chop saws - helping to achieve faster, more uniform cuts every time Applications Cutting drywall track and studs using chop saws Cutting steel and miscellaneous metal materials ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Standard Base material: Drywall studs Tool type: Chop saw Technical Data | Product Class | Standard | Base material | Drywall studs | Tool type | Chop saw | Blade / disc shape | Flat, Type 1 | RPM | 4400 rpm ### ITEMS- 2374132 - Cutting disc AC-D 14x3/32x1 DS P - Package Size 10 pc - 3868593 - 14”x3/32”x1” DS P (320pk) Pallet - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 320x AC-D 14x3/32x1 DS P Cutting disc
